title: How to Import Figma Variables from Styles with a Plugin
content: How to import Figma Variables from styles with a plugin? - The Design System Guide Close Figma Variables # How to import Figma Variables from styles with a plugin? Romina Kavcic You can import Figma Variables with these plugins: #### Variables Pro 🔗 Get the plugin [https://www.figma.com/community/plugin/1264578192495051449/variables-pro-swap-import-export-variables ] #### #### Styles and Variables Organizer 🔗 Get the plugin [https://www.figma.com/community/plugin/816627069580757929/styles-variables-organizer ] #### #### Design Tokens plugin [https://www.figma.com/community/plugin/888356646278934516/design-tokens ] 🔗 Get the plugin [https://www.figma.com/community/plugin/888356646278934516/design-tokens ] #### #### Export/Import Variables Figma plugin [https://www.figma.com/community/plugin/1256972111705530093/export-import-variables] 🔗 Get the plugin [https://www.figma.com/community/plugin/1256972111705530093/export-import-variables] #### (Article) 6 Best-Worked Plugins that Convert Styles to Variables in Figma 🔗 Read the article [https://bootcamp.uxdesign.cc/6-best-worked-plugins-that-convert-styles-to-variables-in-figma-f30b2f49921b] Next question What is the best way to organize Figma files? Published on: Aug 29, 2024 Updated: Updated: Sep 19, 2024 ## Latest additions Glossary I need checklists for creating new Figma components Top 15 Design Systems in 2024 Design system podcasts Design systems using Web Components I'm Romina Kavcic. I coach design teams on implementing design systems, optimizing design processes, and developing design strategy. I'm Romina Kavcic.
